00035    class MemoryCounter
00036    {
00037 
00038    public:
00039 
00043       static bool is_saving();
00044 
00048       static bool is_loading();
00049 
00053       MemoryCounter();
00054 
00058       ~MemoryCounter();
00059 
00063       void clear();
00064 
00068       template <typename T>
00069       MemoryCounter& operator & (T& data);
00070 
00074       template <typename T>
00075       MemoryCounter& operator << (T& data);
00076 
00084       template <typename T> 
00085       void count(const T& data);
00086 
00094       template <typename T> 
00095       void count(T* array, int n);
00096 
00100       size_t size() const;
00101 
00102    private:
00103 
00105       size_t size_;
00106 
00108       int version_;
00109 
00113       MemoryCounter (const MemoryCounter& other);
00114 
00118       MemoryCounter& operator = (const MemoryCounter& other);
00119 
00120    // friends:
00121 
00122       friend void serialize<>(MemoryCounter&, std::string&, const unsigned int);
00123 
00124    };
00125 
00129    template <typename T>
00130    int memorySize(T& data)
00131    { 
00132       MemoryCounter counter;
00133       counter & data;
00134       return counter.size();
00135    }
00136 
00137    // Inline methods
00138 
00139    inline bool MemoryCounter::is_saving()
00140    { return true; }
00141 
00142    inline bool MemoryCounter::is_loading()
00143    { return false; }
00144 
00145    /*
00146    * Return capacity in Bytes.
00147    */
00148    inline size_t MemoryCounter::size() const
00149    {  return size_; }
00150 
00151    /*
00152    * Compute size of one object, default implementation.
00153    */
00154    template <typename T>
00155    inline MemoryCounter& MemoryCounter::operator & (T& data)
00156    {  
00157       serialize(*this, data, version_); 
00158       return *this;
00159    }
00160 
00161    /*
00162    * Compute size of one object, default implementation.
00163    */
00164    template <typename T>
00165    inline MemoryCounter& MemoryCounter::operator << (T& data)
00166    {   
00167       serialize(*this, data, version_); 
00168       return *this;
00169    }
00170 
00171    // Inline method templates
00172 
00173    /*
00174    * Compute size of one object.
00175    */
00176    template <typename T>
00177    inline void MemoryCounter::count(const T& data)
00178    {  size_ += sizeof(T); }
00179 
00180    /*
00181    * Bitwise pack a C-array of objects of type T.
00182    */
00183    template <typename T>
00184    inline void MemoryCounter::count(T* array, int n)
00185    {  size_ += n*sizeof(T); }
00186

00188    // Explicit specializations of serialize function
00189 
00190    // Serialize functions for primitive C++ types
00191 
00192    /*
00193    * Compute size of an bool.
00194    */
00195    template <>
00196    inline void serialize(MemoryCounter& ar, bool& data, 
00197                          const unsigned int version)
00198    {  ar.count(data); }
00199

00201    * Compute size of a char.
00202    */
00203    template <>
00204    inline void serialize(MemoryCounter& ar, char& data, 
00205                          const unsigned int version)
00206    {  ar.count(data); }

00273 
00274    /*
00275    * Compute size of a std::string.
00276    */
00277    template <>
00278    inline void serialize(MemoryCounter& ar, std::string& data, 
00279                          const unsigned int version)
00280    {  ar.size_ += sizeof(size_t) + (data.size() + 1)*sizeof(char); }
